Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I uninstall applications that are locked by phone vendor?  I have an app on my phone called hotels.com. I can't seem to remove it at all.I tried going to Application screen > Edit but this app doesn't have a little minues next to it so I can't remove it this way.I also tried this method:How to delete an app installed with Amazon Appstore?but the Clear Data and Uninstall buttons are greyed out.
Title: how to delete hotels.com app?

history.Text: I have an app on my phone called hotels.com. I can't seem to remove it at all.I tried going to `Application screen > Edit` but this app doesn't have a little minues next to it so I can't remove it this way.I also tried this method:http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/7352/how-to-delete-an-app-installed-with-amazon-appstorebut the `Clear Data` and `Uninstall` buttons are greyed out.

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [How can I uninstall applications that are locked by phone vendor?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/6851/how-can-i-uninstall-applications-that-are-locked-by-phone-vendor)  I have an app on my phone called hotels.com. I can't seem to remove it at all.I tried going to `Application screen > Edit` but this app doesn't have a little minues next to it so I can't remove it this way.I also tried this method:http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/7352/how-to-delete-an-app-installed-with-amazon-appstorebut the `Clear Data` and `Uninstall` buttons are greyed out.
